column5: It has been very busy the past week with little time for fishing. Far too much time in the kitchen storing away fresh vegetables and producing this:  Can hardly keep up with the demand. After a solid week of harvest chores, it was nice to sleep in and get out in the afternoon for some pannies with the son and his woman.   Amy isn't much of a fisher and it gets funny to watch as she is so afraid the fish is going to touch her Any how, back to tending my cauldron
